attributes.action: Maintain EU law that sees non-human animals as sentient beings post Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.google.co.uk/amp/www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/brexit-bill-latest-animal-sentience-cannot-feel-pain-emotion-vote-mps-agree-eu-withdrawal-bill-a8064676.html%3famp

Article from the independent that gives more background to the issue.
attributes.background: The Conservative Government has voted to scrap EU legislation that protects animal welfare and sees non-human animals a sentient beings.  This means that all animals (excluding pets) will be able to be exploited for profit.  These plans will lead to animals being mis-treated and being put in danger.
